member.name: WBEM_REFRESHER_FLAGS
member.summary: Contains flags that modify the behavior of refresher methods.

member.name: WBEM_REFRESHER_FLAGS.WBEM_FLAG_REFRESH_AUTO_RECONNECT
member.summary: If the connection is broken, the refresher attempts to reconnect to the provider automatically.

member.name: WBEM_REFRESHER_FLAGS.WBEM_FLAG_REFRESH_NO_AUTO_RECONNECT
member.summary: If the connection is broken, the refresher does not attempt to reconnect to the provider automatically.
